custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM MicroblogsEntry LEFT JOIN SocialRelation ON (MicroblogsEntry.receiverUserId = SocialRelation.userId2) AND (MicroblogsEntry.socialRelationType = SocialRelation.type_) WHERE ( ( (MicroblogsEntry.socialRelationType = ?)
